original_title: A Day in the Life of a Golden Ninja
overview: This short film is all about the Golden Ninja and his pet dragon! Excited for a day of rousing action, they must first do a series of chores around the monastery. Only then can they go out and begin their day of awesome adventures.... Join our ninja-dragon duo for a day of fun, and perhaps even some action! Only in this NINJAGO LEGACY short.
title: A Day in the Life of a Golden Ninja
